text:
@thatginamiller @SuellaBraverman @BorisJohnson As you've had Covid-19 you may have experienced the red-stinging eye symptom... you can still see fine, but might be concerned that the focus required for a 260mile drive might be an issue. In this context a 30 minute drive makes total sense.
BTW why did you deserve an AB test?
